attributes.review:
Hi, I came from TikTok so if you’re seeing this I’ll spread the message. PLEASE GIVE THIS APP THE WORST REVIEW YOU CAN! The App Store is programmed to delete an app if it gets a less than 1 star average rating. We're already at 1.4 and I know we can do it. Donald Trump is a racist, sexist, misogynistic bigot and he doesn’t deserve anyone's support. Be a decent human being please and let’s get this app taken down :).
Sincerely,
A fellow GenZ
attributes.title: WORST APP EVER

attributes.review: I got this app to educate my self and get up date for our president. Once I did the app downloaded a virus on to my phone, just the president REALLY can’t handle viruses well. Then when I tried to open it is said I could not because I was black and then created a cage around my phone. So now my phone knows what is like to be a child at the boarder.
attributes.title: THIS APP IS AS BAD AS TRUMP HIMSELF

attributes.review: I was so excited at first for this app. Then it literally broke my phone, I opened it, and my phone started glitching, and steaming, and it got very hot, I had to stop holding it, then it literally just exploded. I bought my phone two days ago, and now I had to buy a new one just because of this gosh darn app!
attributes.title: This app is just the worst 🎶the wooooorst🎶

attributes.review: APPLE you must be ASHAMED to have even let this app in the store!!!! It was such a POORLY DEVELOPED APP. I don’t even know how it even got to work in the first place!! This app does not even work in the first place, might as well call it the President or the United States in 2020.... I WANT MY MONEY BACK, and I don’t even care if I downloaded it for free... that was great time wasted and time wasted is money wasted.
attributes.title: WORST APP EVER

attributes.review: i am very disappointed in the layout of this app. you wold think our lovely president would only provide the best app for his supporters but apparently not. i’m devastated. i expected much more from my president. the app is insanely glitchy and hard to use and takes up way too much storage in my phone. i didn’t like it at all. TRUMP 2020.
attributes.title: SCREWED ME OVER

attributes.review:
I want to get his app banned. So if anyone else doesn’t like trump, give it a 1 Star review and apple can take it down if it gets enough bad reviews.
TRUMP 2020😍😘😂💅🧚‍♀️but on a gravestone💅🧜🧜‍♂️🧚🏻‍♂️😍😚🤪🥰🤩
The speeches he makes are great🤩❤️😂🤪💅🧚🏻‍♂️🧚‍♀️🤪😍but make it his last🧚🏻‍♂️🧜😜🤪😂😚💅❤️
It’s ok to make mistakes🧚‍♀️😜🧚🏻‍♂️❤️😍😂💅🏳️‍🌈😘😍😂🧚‍♀️🧚‍♀️🧚‍♀️🧚‍♀️🧜🥰including you’re mother making you😂😜🧚🏻‍♂️🧜😚😍🥰🤪🏳️‍🌈🤩😍😘
attributes.title: I just don’t like trump

attributes.review: When I got this app I thought I was going to get updates about 2020 but all I got was glitches. It drains my battery so bad. The app runs so slow and makes my phone run slow. It also takes up a lot of space of my phone. So, I will be deleting this app soon as it is not worth my time.
attributes.title: This is the worst app ever!

attributes.review: This app is a complete joke! I’m so disappointed. When I opened the app, the first thing I saw was a Cheeto. At first I thought it was a Chicken because of the neck but when you take a closer look it actually was a Cheeto. Just Incase I tried cleaning my screen checking if my screen was dirty but no. Would not recommend this app. Not a great experience with the app🥱
attributes.title: Nope

attributes.review: By app i also meant the person who created it. Why is Donald Trump so ugly. Whenever I am forced to looks at him a feel the urge to puke and this app does not give warning before showing such graphic images of Mr. Cheeto. I actually hd a seizure when one popped up and will now be suing the Trump administration for a small amount of $1 million.
attributes.title: This app is a disgrace to the American public

attributes.review: i downloaded this app and i absolutely hated it. it was poorly set up and it made me ✨uncomfy✨. it should be taken down immediately. it was all about some weird guy with a bad spray tan. DO NOT GET THIS APP. i highly recommend staying far away from this app, if you can drop it off the earth. they made this app 💕✨🧚🏻 now delete it right away💫🦄💋
attributes.title: horrible app
